div.p: Online registration for the 2020-2021 school year for all RETURNING students is NOW OPEN!

a.title: Go to comments for 2020-2021 Online Registration

div.p: McHenry School District 15 has been recognized as one of the Best Communities in the Nation for Music Education by the National Association for Music Merchants (NAMM) Association.

a.title: Go to comments for 2020 Best Community for Music Education

div.p: District 15's Parkland School was named the number one middle school in the nation for STEM, STEAM, and Innovative Programming at the Future of Education Technology Conference (FETC).

a.title: Go to comments for FETC STEM Excellence Winner!

div.p: The District received two Golden Achievement Awards from NSPRA for exemplary public relations.

a.title: Go to comments for NSPRA Golden Achievement Awards

div.p: District 15 has been nationally recognized by the International Society for Technology in Education for exceptional technology integration and fusion within their school community.

a.title: Go to comments for ISTE Technology PLN Award Winner

div.p: District 15 has been nominated as a top five finalist in the nation showcasing how their school programs offer students a digital edge while also empowering them to become actively engaged within their community.

a.title: Go to comments for SETDA National Finalist

div.p: McHenry School District 15 competed as a finalist at the Future of Education Technology Conference (FETC) for the national STEM Excellence Award.

a.title: Go to comments for FETC STEM Excellence

img.alt: District 15 Featured in IASB Educational Journal

a.span: District 15 Featured in IASB Educational Journal

div.p: District 15 is featured in the IASB Educational Journal and is recognized as a model school district for innovation.

a.title: Go to comments for District 15 Featured in IASB Educational Journal

div.p: District Administration Journal is honoring D15 for their innovation in educational technology initiatives as part of the Schools of TechXcellence program.

a.title: Go to comments for TechXcellence Honoree

div.p: D15 was internationally recognized and presented the Making IT Happen Award.

a.title: Go to comments for Making IT Happen Award Recipient

img.alt: Nationally Recognized for Digital Content and Curriculum

a.span: Nationally Recognized for Digital Content and Curriculum

div.p: D15 was one of 3 recipients in the nation to earn the Digital Content and Curriculum Achievement Award.

a.title: Go to comments for Nationally Recognized for Digital Content and Curriculum

div.p: Parkland and MMS were nationally recognized for their exemplary model of STEM curriculum.

a.title: Go to comments for STEM Achievement Award

div.p: McHenry School District 15's new innovative learning spaces are constructed Makerspaces that have no boundaries.

a.title: Go to comments for Empowering Hands-On, Minds-On Learning
